sense.def:
Z besedo
make
povemo, da nekdo stori določeno dejanje. Na primer, kadar človek
makes a suggestion
, nekaj predlaga.

seg.quote: I made the wrong decision.
He made the shortest speech I've ever heard.
We have got to make a really serious effort.
He had two phone calls to make.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
makes someone do something
, tisto osebo pripravi do tega, da tisto naredi. Kadar nekdo
makes someone do something
, tisto osebo prisili ali prepriča, da tisto naredi.

seg.quote: A sudden noise made Brody jump.
Make him listen!
They were made to sit and wait.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
and
COMPLEMENT
or
‘into’

sense.def:
To make
pomeni, da nekdo ali nekaj povzroči, da kaka oseba ali stvar dobi določeno lastnost. Na primer, kadar nekaj
makes someone happy
, ga osreči.

seg.quote: I'd like to make the world a better place.
They're making the old kitchen into a little bedroom.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
make
povemo, kako dobro ali slabo nekdo nekaj dela. Na primer, če človek
makes a success of something
, potem to dobro opravi.

seg.quote: Let's not make a mess of this.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
makes something
, tisto izdela ali ustvari.

seg.quote: I like making cakes.
...the greatest film ever made.
You can make petroleum out of coal.
Martin, can you make us a drink?

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
is made of a particular substance
, je bila tista snov uporabljena pri izdelavi tiste stvari.

seg.quote: The houses were made of brick.
...a flute made from bone.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
makes a sound
, oddaja zvok ali glas.

seg.quote: Try not to make so much noise.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
make
povemo, da je neko število seštevek dveh drugih. Na primer, če dve števili
make 12
, je njun seštevek 12.

Z izrazom
make
povemo, koliko je ura ali kolikšen je seštevek. Na primer, če človek
makes it 4 o'clock
, njegova ura kaže štiri. Kadar človek
makes the answer to a calculation 144
, izračuna, da je seštevek 144.

Kadar človek
makes money
, ga dobi z delom ali vlaganji.

seg.quote: He was making ninety dollars a week.
She made a £200 profit.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
make
povemo, da je nekdo ali nekaj primerno za določeno nalogo ali vlogo. Na primer, če za koga rečemo, da
would make a good secretary
, ima prave sposobnosti za to, da bo dobra tajnica.

seg.quote: Do garden tools make good gifts?

sense.def:
Z besedo
make
lahko povemo, da je del ali vidik nečesa odgovoren za njegov uspeh.

seg.quote: Nicholson's acting really makes the film.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
makes a place
, mu uspe priti do določenega kraja.

seg.quote: I made Ramsdale by dawn.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
makes friends or enemies
, doseže, da ljudje postanejo njegovi prijatelji ali sovražniki.

seg.quote: Roger made a number of enemies.
Karen made friends with several children.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
makes for a place
, se napoti v določeno smer.

seg.quote: We joined the crowd making for the exit.

sense.def:
Kadar nekoga vprašamo, kaj ta oseba
makes of something
, nas zanima, kakšen je njegov vtis ali mnenje o tisti stvari.

seg.quote: He didn't know what to make of his new boss.
Can you make anything of it?

sense.def:
Kadar človek
makes off
, odide, kolikor hitro more.

seg.quote: The vehicle made off at once.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
makes off with something
, tisto ukrade.

seg.quote: Otto made off with the last of the brandy.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
makes something out
, tisto vidi, sliši ali razume.

seg.quote: He could just make out the number plate of the car.
She tried to make out what was being said.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
makes out that something is the case
, poskuša pri drugih ustvariti vtis, da je tako.

seg.quote: He's not really as hard as people make out.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
makes out a cheque
ali
receipt
, napiše vse potrebne podatke na ček ali potrdilo.

Kadar več stvari
make up something
, tisto stvar tvorijo.

seg.quote: ...the various groups which make up society.
All substances are made up of molecules.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
makes up a story
, si izmisli zgodbo.

Če nekdo
makes oneself up
, si nanese kozmetično sredstvo na obraz.

seg.quote: She had magnificent eyes, heavily made up.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
makes up an amount
, doda toliko, da je znesek tak, kot bi moral biti.

seg.quote: Government would have to make up the difference out of its welfare budget.

sense.def:
Kadar dve osebi
make up
ali
make it up
, se po prepiru spet spoprijateljita.

seg.quote: He and Frank made it up.

sense.def:
To make up for something
, pomeni, da nekaj, kar je izgubljeno ali manjka, nadomestimo ali nadoknadimo.

seg.quote: If babies put on very little weight at first, eventually they will gain rapidly to make up for it.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
makes it up to someone
, naredi neki osebi, ki jo je prej razočaral, nekaj, s čimer ji pokaže, da mu je žal.
